topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55728e66636872598c801100#post_55728e66636872598c801100
[bq="QuasarNova"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55728d946368723157080900#post_55728d946368723157080900

Not even close.

Here's the thing, imagine you work for a cable company and you begin to say "Give Cats the Right to Vote" and you use the company's advertising team/equipment to tell people both online and via TVSpots "Give Cats the right to vote, this company is also on board with that" and not only you didn't told them, you are doing it behind their backs.[/bq]
Pretty much; the reason why for video gaming you're double fucked is that if you get fired for this sort of thing nobody will hire you elsewhere unless it's a politically ideologically affiliated company.

To use an analogy let's say you use the company you work for to pressure voters to vote democrat; chances are you're going to get fired and once you get fired you'll only be able to find work at companies that are democratic party affiliated openly.


I've completely forgotten who it was, but like six months ago someone got fired and cause they did this sort of thing they're still unemployed.

Tl:dr; if you try to inject politics into gaming without the company's consent and using the company to push it you'll get fired and -effectively banished from video gaming all together- banished to the shadow realm.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5572913263687217c35b0900#post_5572913263687217c35b0900

It's not just gaming companies, it's any profit based association because of the basic principle that by compromising them with a political ideology you're dragging them into a shithole that's only going to hurt their sales in future projects and would get so much bad publicity they would not be able to recover or if they do, it would be like shooting a guy in the foot, he'll survive yes, but limping and eventually, bleeding to death.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557291f86368722194ac0800#post_557291f86368722194ac0800
[bq="QuasarNova"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5572913263687217c35b0900#post_5572913263687217c35b0900

It's not just gaming companies, it's any profit based association because of the basic principle that by compromising them with a political ideology you're dragging them into a shithole that's only going to hurt their sales in future projects and would get so much bad publicity they would not be able to recover or if they do, it would be like shooting a guy in the foot, he'll survive yes, but limping and eventually, bleeding to death.[/bq]
It's why no individual industries are controlled by a singular ideology in non-communist/non-authoritarian countries.

There will never be a day in which say republicans or democrats control all of say pencil making companies or such because if you were to try that all it would really do is get everyone involved fired and banished to the shadow realm.
